thread.title: UEFA charges Man City for fans booing Champs League anthem
thread.title_full: UEFA charges Man City for fans booing Champs League anthem

title: UEFA charges Man City for fans booing Champs League anthem
text:
> Sports UEFA charges Man City for fans booing Champs League anthem Manchester City's Kevin De Bruyne, centre, shoots and score his sides second goal during the Champions League Group D soccer match between Manchester City and Sevilla at the Etihad Stadium, Manchester, England, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. (AP Photo/Clint Hughes)
